commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We win the fashion competition, hehe! Looks like you guys got cocky because you were in the lead!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: If we win the next one, it'll be a tie. We might even make a big comeback and win!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ugh...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (A comeback. It's a possibility. We had momentum from a few wins in a row, and it hurts to see our streak end. We have to bring it back with the next one!)

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: So Nico, the next contest is a charisma contest? I can't picture what it might be like.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Allow me to explain. Another invaluable characteristic of school idols...is the ultimate charisma, strong enough to woo any living creature!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Any living creature?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: She's right. People with charisma are the most popular. They don't even have to do anything, and people just gather around them.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: To contest each other's charisma, we need to go to the appropriate stage.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Go where?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: The eighth contest between Î¼'s and Nijigasaki. "Overcoming the species barrier to capture the hearts of animals"!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Animals. So that's why we came out to this farm?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yep. You can interact with the free range cows, goats, and sheep here. Whoever wins over more animals with their charisma will be the victor!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I see. If you can win over people, you can win over animals, right?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: So, who is going to participate?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: There's only you and me left for Î¼'s.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Honoka, why don't you give it a try?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I think you have the most charismatic personality.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: M-Me...? You're embarrassing me. But, I'll do it! Time for the charisma showdown!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I guess it's Ayumu for us.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah... I don't think I'm very charismatic, but I'll do my best!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You have one hour. Show everyone your hidden charisma!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hello Mr. Goat. Don't be afraid. That's a good boy.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Seems like Ayumu is going for the goats first.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Her gentle nature seems like it's putting the animals at ease. Things are off to a good start.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ayumu is incredible. I'd rush in and try to hug them all. Cats always scratch me when I do that to them.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: The wind is so nice, the grass so soft. The whole world is telling me to take a nap.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Endless green grass and blue skies above it. It's like I'm back home in Switzerland.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Kanata, Emma?! Are you two here with us at all?!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I wanna pet the goats and sheep too!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I'm sure it's okay if you don't interfere with the competition. Look, a goat is coming over here.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Hey, where did Honoka go? I don't see her anywhere.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: She said she was going to get the sheep and went that way-- Huh?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Eeeeek! Somebody save me!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Honoka?!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whah?! Look at all those sheep running after her!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's a good goat-- Huh?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wait, hold on a second...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh no! The goats Ayumu gathered!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They're running for Honoka!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: All the animals are gone. Don't tell me they all ran after Honoka?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Eeeeek! Somebody do something!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Whew. It's finally over.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: The farmers had to step in and calm down all the animals.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: How on earth do you even do that?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I saw a sign that said you could feed the sheep, so I wanted to start with them.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: At first there were only two or three, but the next thing I knew I was surrounded. I tried to run away, but more and more kept coming.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: And when you ran away the other animals smelled the feed you had and followed.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I can't believe this.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: So, the victory goes to Honoka for gathering a stampede of sheep and other animals! Does anyone disagree?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: W-Woo... I'm happy, but I'm so tired.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Honoka, good work.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sorry everyone.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You did your best. No one could have predicted that would happen.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Isn't using bait a little unfair? That's a sure-fire way to attract animals.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: It doesn't matter, because the animals were attracted to her. You guys got a win with a nap, so now we're even.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I can't even rebut that.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Zzz.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That makes it four to four. They caught up.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. We can't lose the next one!
